CustomField.description: Used to hide products from new CPQ UI
CustomField.formula: CASE(Name, "Collaboration & Messaging - Hosted Exchange",1, "Collaboration & Messaging - Hosted Exchange Plus",1, "Collaboration & Messaging - Enterprise",1, "Collaboration & Messaging - PC Backup Server License",1, "Collaboration & Messaging - Lync®",1, "Collaboration & Messaging - Office Apps (Microsoft® Office 365™)",1, "Collaboration & Messaging - SharePoint®",1, "Collaboration & Messaging - ShareSync®",1, "VPN Solutions Package",1, "Dedicated High Speed Internet Package",1, "SIP Solutions Package",1, "UC Cloud Voice Main Site Package",1, "UC Cloud Voice Remote Site Package",1, "Hosted Voice Package",1, "Conference Now",1, "Hosted Voice Service",1, "Hosted Voice Services",1, "Hosted PBX",1, "Managed Premier PBX",1, "Managed Office Bundle",1, "Managed Office UC Bundle",1, "Managed Enterprise Bundle",1, "ISP Services",1, "Wireless Internet",1, 0) = 1
CustomField.label: Hide In New CPQ
